name: postgresql-db
description: PostgreSQL on SAP BTP, hyperscaler option provides a managed relational database service, based on native PostgreSQL offerings from cloud providers AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform and Alicloud.

links.text: SAP Discovery Center - PostgreSQL, Hyperscaler Option

show_cert_url.description: Adds server and client certificate urls in the VCAP credentials

engine_version.description: The major version of the PostgreSQL database to use. If not provided, the major version is defaulted to 15

locale.description: Indicates the locale for the instance (TODO)

region.description: The infrastructure region where the instance will be deployed.

allow_access.description: Comma separated list of IPs and CF landscape domains from which connectivity to the instance can be established. Default behaviour will be to block all access to the instance from any public IP or CF Domain.

engine_version.description: The major version of the PostgreSQL database to use. If not provided, the existing engine version is not changed.

locale.description: Indicates the locale for the instance (TODO)

allow_access.description: Comma separated list of IPs and CF landscape domains from which connectivity to the instance can be established. It will overide the access list provided during previous create/update operation

show_cert_url.description: Adds server and client certificate urls in the VCAP credentials

engine_version.description: The major version of the PostgreSQL database to use. If not provided, the major version is defaulted to 15

locale.description: Indicates the locale for the instance (TODO)

public_access.description: Indicates whether the instance is publicly accessible. If not provided, it is defaulted to false.

engine_version.description: The major version of the PostgreSQL database to use. If not provided, the existing engine version is not changed.

locale.description: Indicates the locale for the instance (TODO)

enable_cmk.description: Enables CMK features on a particular PostgreSQL Instance

show_cert_url.description: Adds server and client certificate urls in the VCAP credentials

allow_access.description: Comma separated list of IPs and CF landscape domains from which connectivity to the instance can be established. Default behaviour will be to block all access to the instance from any public IP or CF Domain.

audit_log_level.description: Defines which classes of statements will be logged by session audit logging

engine_version.description: The major version of the PostgreSQL database to use. If not provided, the major version is defaulted to 15

locale.description: Indicates the locale for the instance (TODO)

maintenance_window.description: Indicates the preferred maintenance window for the PostgreSQL database instance. The 30-minute maintenance window is selected at random from the specified block of time.

day_of_week.description: Day of the week when the PostgreSQL database instance can be patched.

start_hour_utc.description: Start hour of the time block (in UTC).

duration.description: Duration of the time block in hours.

memory.description: Defines amount of memory (in GB) to be used for the instance. The number of CPU cores is also derived from the value based on the standard plan's semantics

multi_az.description: Indicates whether the instance is a multi-AZ deployment. If not provided, it is defaulted to true. For a multi-AZ instance, twice the number of storage SKU units are deducted from available entitlements

region.description: The infrastructure region where the instance will be deployed.

storage.description: Amount of storage in GB to be allocated to the instance

backup_retention_period.description: Defines backup retention period for the PostgreSQL database instance

audit_log_level.description: Defines which classes of statements will be logged by session audit logging

memory.description: Defines amount of memory (in GB) to be used for the instance. The number of CPU cores is also derived from the value based on the standard plan's semantics. Note that memory cannot be downscaled

storage.description: Amount of storage in GB to be allocated to the instance. Note that storage cannot be downscaled.

start_hour_utc.description: Start hour of the time block (in UTC).

start_minute_utc.description: Start minute of the time block (in UTC).

engine_version.description: The major version of the PostgreSQL database to use. If not provided, the existing engine version is not changed.

memory.description: Defines amount of memory (in GB) to be used for the instance. The number of CPU cores is also derived from the value based on the standard plan's semantics. Note that memory cannot be downscaled

multi_az.description: Indicates whether the instance is a multi-AZ deployment. If not provided, the existing configuration is not changed.

storage.description: Amount of storage in GB to be allocated to the instance. Note that storage cannot be downscaled.

backup_retention_period.description: Defines backup retention period for the PostgreSQL database instance

enable_session_replication.description: Enables session replication for database migrations

show_cert_url.description: Adds server and client certificate urls in the VCAP credentials

memory.description: Defines amount of memory (in GB) to be used for the instance. The number of CPU cores is also derived from the value based on the standard plan's semantics

storage.description: Amount of storage in GB to be allocated to the instance

engine_version.description: The major version of the PostgreSQL database to use. If not provided, the major version is defaulted to 15

multi_az.description: Indicates whether the instance is a multi-AZ deployment. If not provided, it is defaulted to true. For a multi-AZ instance, twice the number of storage SKU units are deducted from available entitlements

locale.description: Indicates the locale for the instance (TODO)

servicePlans.name: trial
servicePlans.description: PostgreSQL service offering for trial accounts

engine_version.description: The major version of the PostgreSQL database to use. If not provided, the major version is defaulted to 15

locale.description: Indicates the locale for the instance (TODO)

region.description: The infrastructure region where the instance will be deployed.

allow_access.description: Comma separated list of IPs and CF landscape domains from which connectivity to the instance can be established. Default behaviour will be to block all access to the instance from any public IP or CF Domain.
